page.title: 16WORKERS IN BUCKLAND BREWER
page.content: THE AREA IS HEAVILY DEPENDENT ON {AGRICULTURE}AS IS SHOWN BY THE RESULTS OF A SURVEY OF THE OCCUPATIONS OF THE LOCAL RESIDENTS. TWENTY-SEVEN PERCENT OF THOSE QUESTIONED REVEALED THAT THEY WERE EMPLOYED IN AGRICULTURE OR IN AN INDUSTRY SUCH AS{MILLING, MILK}OR { {MEAT PROCESSING}WHICH RELY ON FARMING. THE{CONSTRUCTION}INDUSTRY, INCLUDING TRADES SUCH AS ELECTRICIAN, CARPENTER AND DECORATOR, EMPLOYED TWELVE PERCENT OF THOSE INTERVIEWED. THE SAME NUMBER WERE FOUND TO BE EMPLOYED IN {RETAIL SELLING.} ELEVEN PERCENT WORKED IN{ {MANUFACTURING}INDUSTRY, MOSTLY IN A LOCAL LIGHT ENGINEERING FACTORY. TEN PERCENT WERE EMPLOYED AS{TEACHERS}OR IN A{TRAINING}CAPACITY.{DOMESTIC}AND { {CATERING}WORKERS (NINE PERCENT) AND { {CLERICAL}WORKERS (EIGHT PERCENT) WERE THE OTHER MAIN OCCUPATIONS.
